meaningMnemonic: Remember how you learned that 迷う means "to go astray" or "to get lost?" Well when you feel like you're about to go astray or get lost it causes <vocabulary>hesitation</vocabulary>. You end up with a lot of <vocabulary>doubt</vocabulary> about where to go or what to do. It's a natural progression.
readingMnemonic: You learned this reading already when you learned 迷う! Just swap the う for an い.
